description:
Bridge â€“ the king of trick-taking card-games. Now on Nintendo DSiWare!

You can modify the rules of the game and set the AI opponents from beginner to pro difficulty level. Challenge your friends in a local multiplayer game with up to 4 players per game copy. Celebrate your victories and use the integrated speech and text chat functions.

Funny comic 3D graphics on the beach, the varied textures and using your own photo in the game make this collection a fabulous package.

Download the game now! Have lots of fun playing Bridge!
name: Bridge
